channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6879, MT6895, MT6983, MT8188, MT8195, MT8395, MT8781

item.title: CVE-2023-20802|2024-08-02T09:14:40.984Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6879%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt8188%2C%20mt8195%2C%20mt8395%2C%20mt8781
item.description: In imgsys, there is a possible memory corruption due to improper input validation. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07420968; Issue ID: ALPS07420976.

item.title: CVE-2023-20801|2024-08-02T09:14:41.146Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6879%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt8188%2C%20mt8195%2C%20mt8395%2C%20mt8781
item.description: In imgsys,Â there is a possible use after free due to a race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07420968; Issue ID: ALPS07420968.

item.title: CVE-2023-20800|2024-08-02T09:14:41.016Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6879%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt8188%2C%20mt8195%2C%20mt8395%2C%20mt8781
item.description: In imgsys, there is a possible system crash due to a mssing ptr check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07420968; Issue ID: ALPS07420955.
